sentences.cn: 头先入水的跳水；莽撞的向前冲

sentences.en: At the sight he threw himself headlong into the water.
sentences.cn: 看了这情景,他立即纵身跳进水里.

sentences.en: Do not leap headlong into decisions.
He fell headlong and landed on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸朝下一头栽到地上.

sentences.en: He persisted in his headlong stagger, guided on by Herb.
sentences.cn: 他一定要往前踉跄地走, 赫伯给他带路.

sentences.en: He ran headlong for the open door.
sentences.cn: 他飞快地朝敞开着的门跑去。

sentences.en: Here, morality and good sentiments clash headlong.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上，道德和良知互不相容。

sentences.en: I fell headlong into a pool of icy water.
sentences.cn: 我一个倒栽葱跌入了冰冷的池水中。

sentences.en: Mortimer almost ran headlong into a patrol.
sentences.cn: 莫蒂默慌不择路，差点撞到巡逻队。

sentences.en: People do not fall headlong on stumpe of underwood with impunity.
sentences.cn: 任何人也不可能头朝下摔在灌木丛的根茬上而不受伤的.

sentences.en: She fell headlong into the icy pool.
sentences.cn: 她倒栽葱掉进了冰冷的水池中。

sentences.en: She felt as if she were falling headlong into a pit.
sentences.cn: 她感到她似乎突然头朝下掉进坑里.

sentences.en: She missed her footing and fell headlong down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 她一脚踩空，头朝下摔下了楼梯。

sentences.en: The army was in headlong flight.
The little boy fell headlong down the flight of stairs.
sentences.cn: 那小男孩头朝下跌下楼梯.

sentences.en: The rhino charged headlong towards us.
sentences.cn: 犀牛急速地向我们冲来.

sentences.en: When they came to the fork of the road, his horse turned left into a bypath as if it were possessed with a demon and began to run headlong down the hill.
sentences.cn: 当他们来到叉路口时, 他的马就好像被鬼缠住似的,转向左边的小路而急速地冲下山坡去.

words.tran_cn: 冲动的,鲁莽的,无拘束的

trans.tran_cn: 轻率的/地， 迅猛的/地
trans.tran_en: if you rush headlong into something, you start doing it too quickly without thinking carefully

trans.tran_cn: 快速地，头朝下地，轻率地
trans.tran_en: with your head first and the rest of your body following
